metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3626 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the Oracle GlassFish Server component of Oracle FusionMiddleware (subcomponent: Java Server Faces). The supported version that isaffected is 3.1.2. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allowsunauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise Oracle GlassFish Server. Successful attacks require humaninteraction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks ofthis vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset ofOracle GlassFish Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1(Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: glassfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
